item.title: YouTube Shorts Content Creator for PicWish App Promotion - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a creative and talented individual to help promote our app, PicWish, on YouTube Shorts. PicWish is available on the App Store, and we need engaging 10-30 second videos that highlight the app's features and benefits.

Requirements:
Create short, engaging videos (10-30 seconds) for YouTube Shorts.
Use provided sample videos as inspiration and guidelines.
Showcase the PicWish app’s key features, benefits, and user interface in a captivating manner.

About PicWish:
PicWish is a powerful app designed to make photo editing simple and accessible for everyone. It offers a variety of features to enhance and transform your photos with just a few taps. Check it out on the App Store!


Budget: $40
Posted On: July 01, 2024 06:16 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:MP4, Demo Video, Promotional Video, Short Video Ad, Video Production, Video Commercial, Videography, Video Post-Editing
Skills: MP4, Demo Video, Promotional Video, Short Video Ad, Video Production, Video Commercial, Videography, Video Post-Editing
Country: China

item.title: Content Creators - Moms with Kids Aged 3-5 - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for talented content creators who are moms with kids between the ages of 3-7 to join our team. Our ideal candidates are experienced in content creation and understand the importance of good lighting. They should be able to follow our scripts and guidelines precisely to produce high-quality content. In this role you will not need to worry about editing at all, your job will be to product high-quality engaging clips.

Responsibilities:
- Create engaging and high-quality content as per the provided scripts and guidelines.
- Ensure good lighting and sound quality in all video content.
- Collaborate with our team to ensure the content meets our standards and objectives.

Requirements:
- Must be a mom with a child/children aged 3-7.
- Proven experience in content creation (please provide examples of your work).
- Knowledge of good lighting techniques.
- Ability to follow detailed scripts and guidelines.
- Good communication skills and the ability to work collaboratively.
- Have necessary equipment for content creation (camera, tripod, lighting, etc.)

UGC Brief: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1zLNmCdLXNCPZREs8DoK_5pU_QGJw7LUBKAvawZ6cqjA/edit?usp=sharing


Posted On: July 01, 2024 06:13 UTC
Category: Creative Writing
Skills:Content Creation, Social Media Content Creation
Skills: Content Creation, Social Media Content Creation
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Editor videa pro dlouhá videa na Youtube - Upwork
item.description:
Potřebuje najmout 3 externí pracovníky
Střihač videí pro kanál Youtube věnovaný autům/automobilům a vozidlům.

Styl videa bude kombinací těchto dvou videí

Scénáře a voice over budou poskytnuty
Chceme 1-2 videa týdně

Cena návrhu je orientační; může se pohybovat od 20 do 40 USD.

Hledáme někoho s následujícími požadavky:
1. Rychlá doba zpracování 24-48 hodin
2. Rychlá doba odezvy
3. Dobrá znalost vyprávění příběhů a udržení na Youtube.

item.title: Editor videa s short form obsahem pro kanál Youtube - Upwork
item.description:
Hledáme talentovaného a zkušeného střihače videí do našeho týmu kanálů Youtube. Jako editor krátkých videí budete zodpovědný za vytváření poutavých a vysoce kvalitních videí, která budou zveřejněna na našem kanálu. Jedná se o zajímavou příležitost pracovat na rostoucí platformě s velkým a oddaným publikem.

Odpovědnosti:
- Úprava a vylepšování krátkých videí pro náš kanál Youtube.
- Zajistit, aby videa byla vizuálně atraktivní a poutavá
- Spolupracovat s obsahovým týmem na zajištění souladu videí s vizí kanálu
- Udržovat si přehled o nejnovějších trendech a technikách v oblasti editace videí

Požadavky:
- Prokazatelné zkušenosti s editací videí
- Znalost softwaru pro střih videa
- Dobrá znalost vyprávění příběhů a struktury vyprávění
- Smysl pro detail a schopnost pracovat v napjatých termínech
- Znalost osvědčených postupů pro Youtube

KVALITA!
Videa musí vypadat alespoň jako toto: https://youtube.com/shorts/K2vsed3fUhQ

Přidejte se k nám a pomozte nám posunout náš kanál Youtube na vyšší úroveň!


Budget: $15
Posted On: July 01, 2024 06:08 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Graphic Design, Adobe Premiere Pro, Czech, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Graphic Design, Adobe Premiere Pro, Czech, Video Production
Country: Czech Republic
click to apply

item.title: Video Editing: Long Term Collaboration - Upwork
item.description:
My company seeks a long-term collaboration with a skilled video editor to help produce consistent content for our social media platforms.

Here are the details of what we're looking for:

1. Skill creating long-format videos for YouTube. Most of our video is film from in-person presentations with multiple cameras. There is very little post-production editing, b-roll, etc., required.
2. Familiarity in using Opus to create shorts for Tiktok, Instagram, etc.
3. Attention to detail. Creating quality work that does not require excessive back-and-forth for approval.
4. Ability to commit 20 to 30 hours weekly to video editing and post-production.

If interested, please reply back with a personal message, explaining why we should select you for the job. Also include your video portfolio to review as well as explain your relevant video editing experience.

Thank you!

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 06:07 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Videography
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Videography
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor with Expertise in KDrama and Asian Drama Content - Upwork
item.description:
Hello!

We are seeking a dedicated full-time Video Editor who can craft engaging videos in the style of our preferred examples:

- https://www.youtube.com/@MyDramaListOfficial/videos
- https://www.youtube.com/@miss-k-drama/videos

Applicants must be fans of Kdramas, Asian dramas, and Asian films, with proven experience in video editing. Deadlines must be respected because our channel is big. Videos are usually 8-10min long and we pay by video done. Provide some examples if you have done similar work.

If you're a creative and passionate video editor who loves Kdramas and Asian films, we would love to hear from you!

---

Tell me in proposal what is your favorite actor and movie/show? You're editing skill will be tested before moving forward and working together on big projects :)

Budget: $55

item.title: Expert in YouTube Content Strategy for the Fondation Haute Horlogerie - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for an expert to develop a comprehensive content strategy for our YouTube channel, Fondation Haute Horlogerie.

Our goal is to significantly boost our visibility, attract more subscribers, and create engaging, high-quality content that resonates with our audience.

Responsibilities:
--------------------------------------
- Analyze the current YouTube channel and content.
- Propose a complete overhaul of the YouTube page, including visual and structural improvements.
- Develop ideas for longer, more strategic, and fun video content.
- Create a strong content plan to increase engagement and subscriber count.
- Implement techniques to enhance the visibility and virality of our content.
- Collaborate with the team to align content with our brand and objectives.

Objectives:
--------------------------------------
-  Boost the number of subscribers and engagement.
-  Improve the aesthetics and user experience of the YouTube channel.
-  Develop a strong, engaging, and strategic content lineup.
-  Significantly enhance the overall visibility of the YouTube page.

Required Qualifications:
--------------------------------------
Proven experience in YouTube content strategy and channel growth.
Skills in video production, editing, and channel optimization.
Strong creativity and ability to develop engaging and fun content ideas.
Knowledge of the haute horlogerie industry is a plus.
Ability to analyze metrics and adjust strategies accordingly.
How to Apply:
Please submit your CV and a portfolio of your previous YouTube work, including examples of channels you have successfully grown.

YouTube Channel:
--------------------------------------
https://www.youtube.com/@fhh.fondation.haute.horlogerie

Website:
--------------------------------------
https://www.hautehorlogerie.org/en

Hourly Range: $5.00-$100.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 05:56 UTC
Category: Content Strategy
Skills:AI Content Creation, Marketing Strategy, YouTube, YouTube Ads, YouTube Marketing, Social Media Marketing, Content Strategy, Social Media Management, YouTube Development, Content Writing
Skills: AI Content Creation, Marketing Strategy, YouTube, YouTube Ads, YouTube Marketing, Social Media Marketing, Content Strategy, Social Media Management, YouTube Development, Content Writing
Country: France
click to apply

item.title: Digital Marketing - Upwork
item.description:
Responsibilities: Social Media Management :

Develop and implement social media strategies across various platforms (Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn, TikTok).
Create and schedule engaging content to drive brand awareness and audience engagement.
Monitor and respond to comments and messages in a timely manner.
Analyze social media metrics and provide regular reports on performance and engagement.
Content Creation:

Generate creative and compelling content for social media posts, blogs, newsletters, and other digital platforms.
Collaborate with the design team to produce visually appealing graphics and multimedia content.
Stay updated with industry trends and incorporate relevant topics into content.

Video Editing:

Edit videos for social media, website, and other digital platforms.
Ensure high-quality production standards and brand consistency in all video content.
Work with the marketing team to develop video concepts and scripts.
TikTok Ads Management:

Plan, execute, and optimize TikTok ad campaigns to achieve marketing objectives.
Monitor ad performance and make data-driven decisions to improve ROI.
Stay up-to-date with TikTok advertising trends and best practices.

Qualifications:

Proven experience in social media management and content creation.
Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro).
Experience with TikTok ads management and familiarity with the platform’s advertising tools.
Strong understanding of digital marketing principles and best practices.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Creative mindset with an eye for detail.
Ability to multitask and manage time effectively.
Familiarity with social media analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics, Hootsuite, Sprout Social).
Preferred Skills:

Experience with other digital advertising platforms (e.g., Facebook Ads, Google Ads).
Knowledge of SEO and content marketing strategies.


Posted On: July 01, 2024 05:44 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Campaign Management, Social Media Marketing, Marketing Strategy, Internet Marketing, Campaign Optimization
Skills: Campaign Management, Social Media Marketing, Marketing Strategy, Internet Marketing, Campaign Optimization
Country: Hong Kong
click to apply

Aku akan beli beberapa video kamu jika hasil video kamu bagus.

Terima kasih.

item.title: Faceless video production, script writer and voice over artist in Hindi - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description: Video Production Specialist (3-6 Month Project)

Location: Remote
Duration: 3 to 6 months
Work Schedule: Part-time, 1 video per week
Compensation: $50 to $60 per video

About the Project:
We are seeking a talented and creative Video Production Specialist to join our team for a 3 to 6 month project. The project involves creating engaging, faceless videos with voiceovers in Hindi on a variety of topics including health, finance, news (India-based), Indian history, and culture. The videos will be posted weekly on our YouTube channel.

Responsibilities:

Video Production: Create faceless videos using fair-use compliant footage, stock images, and other relevant visuals.
Voice Over: Provide clear and engaging voiceovers in Hindi using a narration style that captivates the audience.
Content Creation: Develop hook statements to capture viewers' attention and ensure the content is compelling and informative.
SEO & YouTube Tags: Optimize video titles, descriptions, tags, and keywords to enhance discoverability and engagement.
Research: Conduct thorough research on the topics to ensure accuracy and relevance.
Consistency: Ensure the production and release of 1 video per week, maintaining high-quality standards and consistency.
Collaboration: Work closely with the project manager to align video content with the overall channel strategy.
Requirements:

Language Proficiency: Fluency in Hindi, both written and spoken, with a clear and engaging narration style.
Video Editing Skills: Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro) and familiarity with creating faceless videos.
Voice Over Experience: Experience in voiceover work, particularly in Hindi, with the ability to convey information clearly and engagingly.
SEO Knowledge: Understanding of YouTube SEO, including keyword research, tags, and video optimization techniques.
Creative Skills: Ability to create compelling hook statements and engaging content that captures the audience’s attention.
Research Skills: Strong research skills to gather accurate and relevant information for video content.
Time Management: Ability to manage time effectively and meet weekly deadlines consistently.
Attention to Detail: Meticulous attention to detail to ensure high-quality production standards.
Preferred Qualifications:

Experience in producing content on health, finance, news, Indian history, and culture.
Familiarity with YouTube analytics and tools to track and improve video performance.
Ability to work independently and as part of a remote team.
Creative problem-solving skills and adaptability to changing project requirements.
How to Apply:
If you are passionate about creating high-quality, engaging video content and meet the above requirements, we would love to hear from you. Please submit your resume, a cover letter detailing your relevant experience, and links to any previous work (especially in Hindi) to [email address].

Application Deadline:

We look forward to working with a talented Video Production Specialist who can bring our vision to life and help us grow our YouTube channel with engaging and informative content.

Budget: $50
Posted On: July 01, 2024 05:37 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Animated Cartoon, Science Fiction, Self-Help, Documentary, Slide Animation, Voice-Over Recording, Whiteboard Video, Video Production, Voice-Over, Narration
Skills: Animated Cartoon, Science Fiction, Self-Help, Documentary, Slide Animation, Voice-Over Recording, Whiteboard Video, Video Production, Voice-Over, Narration
Country: IND
click to apply

item.title: Editor needed: Facebook and instgram ads (face to cam) + VSL editing ( face to cam) - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for an experienced video editor to help us edit multiple video ads and edit our VSL. The ideal candidate should have experience in making video ads, especially for platforms like Facebook and instagram. Those are "Talking head" videos. We would like the VSL edited in a similar way to this: https://www.eliteceos.com/proof
We want the ads to have a similar style but be more dynamic since they are ads.
EXTREMELY IMPORTANT: WE ARE READY TO PAY $20 per minute after editing. So, if the VSL after editing comes down to 10 minutes, it would be 10 * $20.
Plz provide a portfolio of your previous video ad work and/or VSL.e

Project Details:
We have 4 groups of ads and a VSL.
Groups 1, 2, and 3 each have multiple hooks but share the same main part (body).
For example, Group 1 has 8 hooks, resulting in 8 different videos with different openings (hooks) but the same main content (body). The same applies to Groups 2 and 3.

Responsibilities:
Edit raw video footage into engaging video ads.
Add graphics, animations, and special effects.
Ensure the final videos fit our brand and marketing goals.
Manage multiple versions of videos and keep them consistent.

Requirements:
Experience in video editing, especially for ads.
Strong portfolio showing previous video ad work.
Great attention to detail and creativity.
Ability to meet deadlines.
Experience handling multiple video versions.

Preferred:
Knowledge of direct response marketing and lead funnels.
Up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in video advertising.
If you are passionate about video editing and can create standout video ads, we'd love to hear from you!

Hourly Range: $15.00-$37.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 05:24 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Visual Effects, Video Editing
Skills: Visual Effects, Video Editing
Country: Canada
click to apply
